Name: Izeriya
About the game: Izeriya was a powerful cityâ€¦but forces of evil captured it. The little man named Trix is heading to this city to destroy the evil within. In game you will pass obstacles and fight! The game has a upgrade system, so you can upgrade the damage of your sword and fireballs, or you can upgrade your health and quantity of your mana. In game you will find three locations, and some extra levels! It won't be easy! You will kill a lot of monsters, to try not to die. Fight with hard bosses at the end of the locations!
